document.full_text: mclaren's lewis hamilton can make amends for his ill-disciplined monaco weekend with a montreal win on sunday, even if red bull's sebastian vettel is the man with the momentum.
document.title: lewis hamilton chasing canadian hat-trick
lines_and_colors: mclaren's lewis hamilton can make amends for his ill-disciplined monaco weekend with a montreal win on sunday, even if red bull's sebastian vettel is the man with the momentum.
